donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Project aims to provide INSTAT with the necessary support towards the preparatory CENSUS work that will take place before the field operations. 
Project aims also to involve Roma community in the Census 2011, by particularly informing Roma communities about the value of the enumeration, the benefits of having accurate statistical data and the procedures that must be followed to realize this. The essential thing is to make Roma people comfortable with the process and questionnaires. The intervention will aim to achieve an increased awareness of the Roma population about the Census enumeration with a specific attention to increasing the enumeration of Roma children in order to improve their access to basic services.

project_descr: Population and Housing Census aims to give an up-to-date and accurate picture of the demographic, economic and social reality of Albania.
